updates.title: ARM64 support for Win32 apps
updates.subtitle: Windows ARM64 device support for Win32 applications
updates.content: When adding a Win32 app to Intune, you can select an option to check and install the app on Windows devices running ARM64 operating systems. Existing 64-bit Win32 applications will also have ARM64 selected automatically.
features: Automatic ARM64 selection for existing 64-bit apps
x64 selection no longer targets ARM64 devices
